judgement: AwarenessOutrageous1's assertion that God is manipulatively evil and that all religions are man-made fictions designed to control the masses is more extreme and unfounded than _TheMoralist's_ view that free will is a gift from God.
steering: It's interesting to see how different perspectives on free will and God's role in the universe can lead to such strong reactions. Maybe we can learn from each other's points of view and have a more nuanced discussion about the nature of free will and morality?
